approval_auto_assign_config.description: Configuration for how the component should be auto-assigned to an agent when change status to pending_approval

approval_required.description: Whether the component requires approval before it can be run

approval_roles.description: List of roles that are required to approve this component before it can be run

approval_scheduled_delay.description: The delay before the approval task is scheduled to run. If the calculated time falls on a weekend, it will be automatically moved to the next business day (Monday). Note that holidays are not considered.

approval_sla_duration.description: The SLA for the approval task. If the calculated deadline falls on a weekend, it will be automatically moved to the next business day (Monday). Note that holidays are not considered.

approval_task_name.description: The name of the approval task to use for this component. If not provided, the task will be called 'Review: <Name>'

auto_assign_config.description: Configuration for how the component should be auto-assigned to an agent

component_id.description: The form / branch / trigger / configuration endpoint ID

component_key.description: The component key for the component

component_type.description: The component type enum, form | branch | trigger | configuration

data_promotion_config.description: The configuration for how data is promoted to top level action data

id.description: Unique identifier for the action blueprint component

input_mapping.description: For components that take inputs, this maps the input keys to the expression that will be used to extract the value at runtime

name.description: Human-readable name of the action blueprint component

permitted_roles.description: List of roles that are permitted to run this component

prerequisites.description: List of component keys that must be completed before this component can be run

scheduled_delay.description: The delay before the component is scheduled to run. If the calculated time falls on a weekend, it will be automatically moved to the next business day (Monday). Note that holidays are not considered.

sla_duration.description: The SLA for the component. If the calculated deadline falls on a weekend, it will be automatically moved to the next business day (Monday). Note that holidays are not considered.

state_transition_rules.description: Configuration for automatic state transitions - e.g. a condition where a form approval can be skipped
